channel.title: Help pick a colourscheme for my bike!
channel.description:
Due to an accident, some of the stickers/decals on my bike got "destroyed" pretty bad and replacing them will cost more than buying paint and such for an air compressor(which we have), so I'm going to paint the bike myself.
only pic of the bike I have on hand: http://i.imgur.com/wyMZq.jpg
the bike model: yamaha dt 125 r
I wanted to do something with the red and white original colour scheme(http://www.flickr.com/photos/45234635@N07/4162694319/) but as you can see from my pic, the frame is blue and it's quite a nice paint job so I'd rather keep it (saves me having to strip the bike completely) and I'm not sure how it'd look
so, gents, any suggested colour scheme for the bike? the seat can be [url=http://www.ebay.co.uk/sch/i.html?_nkw=yamaha+dt+125+r+seat+cover&_sacat=0&_dmpt=UK_Motorcycle_Parts&_odkw=yamaha+dt+125+r+seat&_osacat=0]black/white/purple/blue/red/green[/url], ideally the scheme will have white and red, and ideally the frame can be kept blue

item.title: Help pick a colourscheme for my bike!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Due to an accident, some of the stickers/decals on my bike got “destroyed” pretty bad and replacing them will cost more than buying paint and such for an air compressor(which we have), so I’m going to paint the bike myself.

only pic of the bike I have on hand: http://i.imgur.com/wyMZq.jpg

the bike model: yamaha dt 125 r

I wanted to do something with the red and white original colour scheme(http://www.flickr.com/photos/45234635@N07/4162694319/) but as you can see from my pic, the frame is blue and it’s quite a nice paint job so I’d rather keep it (saves me having to strip the bike completely) and I’m not sure how it’d look

so, gents, any suggested colour scheme for the bike? the seat can be black/white/purple/blue/red/green, ideally the scheme will have white and red, and ideally the frame can be kept blue

item.source: Help pick a colourscheme for my bike!
